attributes.additional_details:
As you know the current Government has changed University fee’s to the outrageous price of £9000 a year, this is forcing thousands of people to reconsider going in to university level education, and making only those the conservatives feel should go to university go aka the wealthy/upper class.

I myself would not have gone to university if the Fee's had been this large.

So I and most people would like, no demand that the university fees return to their previous level or be completely abolished all together.
